n = int(input())
d = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())))

res = 0
for i in range(n):
    res += d[i] * d[n-1-i]

print(res)

from sys import stdin

n = int(stdin.readline())
takoyaki = [int(x) for x in stdin.readline().split()]

total = 0
for i in range(n):
    for j in range(i+1, n):
        total += takoyaki[i] * takoyaki[j]

print(total)

raw_input()
d = map(int, raw_input().split())

print sum(map(lambda x: x[0] * x[1], [(d[i], d[j]) for i in range(len(d)) for j in range(i + 1, len(d))]))

N = int(input())
d = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

ans = 0
for i in range(N-1):
    for j in range(i+1, N):
        ans += d[i] * d[j]

print(ans)

n = int(input())
d = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
print(sum([d[i] * d[j] for i in range(n) for j in range(i + 1, n)]))

N = int(input())
d = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

sum = 0
for i in range(N):
    for j in range(i + 1, N):
        sum += d[i] * d[j]

print(sum)
